### Question 1
```{r}
courses <- read_csv(here("courses.csv"))
grades  <- read_csv(here("grades.csv"))
students <- read_csv(here("students.csv"))
```

```{r}
grades <- read_delim(
  here("grades.csv"),
  delim = ";",
  col_types = cols(
    id        = col_integer(),
    course_id = col_integer(),
    grade     = col_double()
  ),
  show_col_types = FALSE
)
```

### Question 2

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(knitr)

courses |>
  arrange(course) |> 
  rename(
    "course name"      = course,
    "identifier"       = course_id,
    "trimester"        = trimester,
    "number of grades" = nb_grades
  ) |>
  kable()

```
